io.name: TCISUPIA0030301_INBOUND

<annotation> <documentation>결제일자</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="8" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="odueMngAreaCd"> <annotation> <documentation>연체관리지역코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="100" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

io.name: TCISUPIA0030301_OUTBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:TCISUPIA0030301_outbound" /> <complexType name="TCISUPIA0030301_outbound"> <sequence> <element name="mnthsCAptmLstRowcount"> <annotation> <documentation>개월별배분목록건수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> </simpleType> </element> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="mnthsCAptmLstList" type="tns:MNTHS_C_APTM_LST_LIST_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>개월별배분목록</documentation> <appinfo> <p:adjustLength category="variableField" lengthFieldURL="MNTHS_C_APTM_LST_ROWCOUNT" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="MNTHS_C_APTM_LST_LIST_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="odueMngAreaCd"> <annotation> <documentation>연체관리지역코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="100" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="empNm"> <annotation> <documentation>사원명</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="100" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="aptmCd"> <annotation> <documentation>배분코드</documentation> <appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="5" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="aptmClasNm"> <annotation> <documentation>배분항목명</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="100" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="lngsOdueMths"> <annotation> <documentation>최장연체개월수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="11" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="mngCnt"> <annotation> <documentation>관리건수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> name="oduePrncAmt"> <annotation> <documentation>연체원금금액</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="19" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="odueCmisAmt"> <annotation> <documentation>연체수수료금액</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="19" /> </restriction> </simpleType>
